heading: Share of touristic trips taken by train in 2022 in the EU27
subheading: On average 0.12% of all touristic trips among all 27 EU member states were made by train. With France and Germany leading with 0.24% and Greece as last with 0.01%
textNote: This collection covers national tourism, in other words tourism by residents of a country to destinations in the country of residence (domestic tourism) or abroad (outbound tourism). No data available for Cyprus and Denmark.
